text: mal placement of thumb 90% Short distal phalanx of finger 90% Short toe 90% Abnormality of thumb phalanx 7.5% Finger syndactyly 7.5% Preaxial foot polydactyly 7.5% Symphalangism affecting the phalanges of the hand 7.5% Synostosis of carpal bones 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
